body_html:
Yes, that's the function being called.
I think we have overloaded it with torch.add, which is called when we do + on tensors.
Also, for questions, it's better to ask them on the forums: https://discuss.pytorch.org/

Also, for questions, it's better to ask them on the forums: https://discuss.pytorch.org/
body:
Yes, that's the function being called.
I think we have overloaded it with `torch.add`, which is called when we do `+` on tensors.
Also, for questions, it's better to ask them on the forums: https://discuss.pytorch.org/
